name: Roy Tang
text: Exactly. I don't feel like I have a right to complain about choices other people made. There was a time when I thought that it was enough that I made an informed choice and did my best effort to communicate that through the channels I was familiar with (facebook/ twitter/etc).     You and I agree it's not enough. The question is, what's the next step? Or we just going to complain about it, or are we going to search for ways to overcome the problems?
